title: #251 - Brendon Walsh, Nick Thune, & ME
description:
Comedians & New podcasting team Nick Thune & Brendan Walsh & I hang out in the Mancave, kill a bottle of Titos, and talk about being bad dads, Brendon's start in stand-up with Gorilla suits, we call Doug Stanhope, we talk about their new Podcast & commiserate on how no one knows who Jason Segel is...ASLO we proceed to black out.

 

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron to get Three Free MEALS w/ Free Shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This Podcast is also brought to you by BEACHBODY ON DEMAND to claim a free trail membership TEXT [Bert] to 303030 and get full access to this entire platform for free!

This Podcast is brought to you by DraftKings...go to Https://www.draftkings.com and use the promo code BERTCAST to play this week with a chance to win ONE BILLION DOLLARS!!!
